Rulings.HAT:
● If the effect of "Royal Decree" is being applied, this card *will* destroy itself.

● After activation, this card continuously targets the monster that was Special Summoned.
● "You can't activate Spell Effects" includes the effects of Spells already face-up on the field.
Rulings.Vegas:
● If the effect of "Royal Decree" is being applied, this card *will* destroy itself.

● After activation, this card continuously targets the monster that was Special Summoned.
● "You can't activate Spell Effects" includes the effects of Spells already face-up on the field.
Rulings.Meadowlands:
● If the effect of "Royal Decree" is being applied, this card won't destroy itself (This is a TCG-US Ruling difference).

● After activation, this card continuously targets the monster that was Special Summoned.
● "You can't activate Spell Effects" includes the effects of Spells already face-up on the field.
Rulings.FireWater:
● If the effect of "Royal Decree" is being applied, this card *will* destroy itself.

● After activation, this card continuously targets the monster that was Special Summoned.
● "You can't activate Spell Effects" includes the effects of Spells already face-up on the field.
